channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Good Morning Britain
channel.desc: News, current affairs and lively debate.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Lorraine
channel.desc: Lorraine Kelly presents a topical mix of entertainment, discussion and showbiz glamour as well as the latest fashion, food and celebrity gossip.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: This Morning
channel.desc: Magazine show with news and topical items, celebrity guests, expert advice, real-life stories, competitions and a mix of cookery, health, beauty, lifestyle and more.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Loose Women
channel.desc: Join the Loose Women panellists as they interview celebrity guests and discuss the day's most topical issues, from current affairs to celebrity gossip and the latest showbiz news.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV Lunchtime News
channel.desc: The latest headlines from around the world at lunchtime with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents, all of which are followed by a national weather forecast.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV News London
channel.desc: The latest news and weather from London and the South East.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Dickinson's Real Deal
channel.desc: David Dickinson pitches up in Burton with his team of dealers including Henry Nicholls, Stewart Hofgartner, Tim Hogarth and Mark Stevens.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Tenable
channel.desc: A team of five workmates from Wales attempt to answer a series of Top 10 list questions for their chance to win a bumper cash prize.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Tipping Point
channel.desc: Ben Shephard hosts the quiz show in which three players take on an extraordinary machine in the hope of winning a cash jackpot.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: The Chase
channel.desc: Join Bradley Walsh as Liam from Manchester, Alison from Beverley, Heather from Doncaster and Mike from Marlborough put everything on the line hoping to defeat one of the Chasers.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV News London
channel.desc: The latest news and weather from London and the South East.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Party Political Broadcast
channel.desc: A Party Political Broadcast on behalf of the Green Party.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV Evening News
channel.desc: National and international news with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents in the UK and around the world, plus a focus on the stories that matter to you.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Emmerdale
channel.desc: Set in the heart of the beautiful countryside of the Yorkshire Dales, this realistic down-to-earth drama superbly chronicles the joys and the heartbreaks of a tight-knit community.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Coronation Street
channel.desc: The story of everyday life in a small and tightly-knit community is the core of the world's longest-running primetime drama serial and the highest-rating programme in the UK.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Frauds
channel.desc: Crime drama. Bert reveals her master plan, but Sam knows nothing that will ever be straightforward with Bert - meanwhile, a shock discovery threatens to derail the heist.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV News at Ten
channel.desc: ITV News provides a fresh perspective on the major stories of the day with national and international news with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV News London
channel.desc: The latest news and weather from London and the South East.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Peston
channel.desc: Join Robert Peston for a late-night political magazine show featuring big interviews with the country's leading politicians, topical guests, and the best political gossip.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: In Convo - Fresh Cuts 2025
channel.desc: Ras Kwame hosts a series of conversations celebrating life, the arts and human existence with a range of guests opening the door to unfiltered and honest conversations.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Shop on TV
channel.desc: Teleshopping.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Borderline
channel.desc: The first episode of a police drama series. A detective from Northern Ireland teams up with one from the Republic of Ireland to investigate the death of a woman.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Unwind with ITV
channel.desc: Your daily escape designed to calm the mind and encourage relaxation and reflection.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Tour de Fred
channel.desc: Belfast: Cycling isn't Fred Sirieix's only way of getting active in Belfast as he faces a former Irish boxing champion and a pottery wheel presents a creative challenge.
